instructions: Swipe down from the top of the screen to reveal the notifications bar. Double-tap your profile image in the upper-right corner. Three icons appear: your Google account, Add guest , and Add user . Tap Add guest . Your device will take a couple of minutes to complete the setup process. When you're finished with guest mode, switch back to your profile by repeating the first two steps above and tapping your account.

Open the device Settings . Tap Security . Scroll down and tap Screen Pinning . Read the on-screen instructions and tap the toggle to switch Screen Pinning to On . Tap Lock device when unpinning if you choose, or close out of the settings. Open the screen you wish to pin, then tap Overview (the square icon at the bottom-center of the screen). Tap the thumbtack on the app window to pin the screen. To unpin a screen, press and hold Back and Overview . If prompted, enter your PIN, pattern, or password.
